none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 15, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
Soaring waves of sound interspersed with jabs of indigestible noise and distortion. PIG HEART TRANSPLANT make you rethink music as they reinvent themselves on virtually every release. This 2007 cassette features two tracks - 18 minutes and 8 minutes respectively. One harsh and poignant, one subtle and disturbing....enjoy your week. BLACKMAIL
//1.bp.blogspot.com/-9_pziiEoFo8/UeOkinkEHVI/AAAAAAAAINY/yAM7yycTPWI/s1600/pht+-+blackmail+copy.jpg

seo.title: Pig Heart Transplant - Blackmail - Terminal Escape
